channel.title: \508/ RuneScape demonWars 1.0! (beta) \508/ + (-:Custom Client:-)
channel.description:
Please reply if you like it or not or else i will remove!
[size=24pt]NOTE: IF YOU HAVE PROBLEMS WITH THE CUSTOM ITEMS SIMPLY RE-SAVE THE APPLET_SUB1.JAVA AND COMPILE THE CLIENT.[/size]
[size=24pt]NOTE 2: Some one has tried to hack my ACC :mad:, but you dont have to worry i have it back :D. so the release date is still in this month!! :P[/size]
[size=24pt]RSDW - IM GOING TO ADD A 525 VERSION[/size]
[IMG]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/logosmall.jpg[/img]
RuneScape DemonWars 1.0!!! (beta)
[size=24pt]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[size=18pt]Become A Mod Today!!![/size]
The MOD contest has begun, if you would like to become a MOD when this server's full version launches online and private, you can sent me a private Message (on mopar) but it cant be any username or password that has bin used on mopar or rs or any site or forum on the web {IT MUST BE NEW!}. and i will add you as a MOD,
i cant add every one on it so you need to mension in the mail why you would like to be a MOD on my server. [size=24pt]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
My latest project.
Features: 1, clan wars (100%) 2, castle wars (90%) 3, god wars dungeon (85%) 4, 5 dimensions (100%) {all npc's add all dimensions} 5, bounty hunter (100% with random drops) 6, fist of guthix (Reaper's lair) {in the cave of FOG are fear reapers that drop 100 to 1000 fog tokens} 7, NEW SUMMONING MONSTERS 8, Duel Arena (90%) {there is a glitch wich makes the client crash} [im trying to fix it] ________________________________________________________________ | | | | | Hey just a friendly note: | | | | This version is LD | | | | Therefore it will have new models | | | | | ______________________________________________________________
[size=18pt]RSDW Cursors[/size] http://uppit.com/c6fcsqeq49ue/RSDW_cursors.zip
Skills:
Attack, Defence and strength= 100%
Ranged= 90%
Magic= 90% Magic vs player (ancients) = 90% Magic vs player (modern) = 90% (still adding spells) Magic vs Npc (modern, ancients and lunar) = 100& (just wield any staff) {each staff has his own spell effect}
Prayer= 100%
Construction= 100%
(still bulby based)
FireMaking= 0%
(i used firemaking to respawn objects)
[size=24pt]Crafting= 50%[/size]
You can craft your own Dark Bow!!!!!!
All other skills work perfectly= 100%
(still buly based)
[size=18pt]RSDW WALLPAPER[/size] [IMG]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/RuneScapedemonWarsfulllogo.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/castlewars.jpg[/img] [img]http://i901.photobucket.com/albums/ac215/skillspar/Clanwars.jpg[/img] item.title: \508/ RuneScape demonWars 1.0! (beta) \508/ + (-:Custom Client:-)
item.dc:creator: @DemonWars DemonWars
item.description:
@DemonWars wrote:

[size=36pt]MESSAGE FROM DEMONWARS[/size]

thank you all for your reply’s.

thanks to you i will post my 2.0 version in a few weeks.

let me announce that it will have accurate block sounds,
most of RS’s npcs and their original speeches,
a new home (no portals like u asked),
better combat system,
HD and LD (both fullscreen and resizable and fixed),
i removed most of the custom items and added some new ones that only give a better detail and model (to the 508 items),
even a NPC pvp area and world,
more sounds,
greater summon GFX’s
more added staff and sword walk, stand and defend emotes,
and 2 worlds:
1: Normal
2: PVP

thats it for now, enjoy my 1.0 version

Greetz DemonWars

Read full topic

… download and take them out yourself… not hard to do and some people enjoy customs and if others dont they can simply remove them.
